biotools.summary:
A high-quality SNV database for interspecies genetic divergence investigation among macaques.

A database for genetic divergence investigation among macaques.

MACSNVdb is an open-access SNV database comprising ~74.51 million high-quality non-redundant SNVs called from 20 macaques that may assist researchers to investigate interspecies genetic divergence between macaques.

bioschemas.name: MACSNVdb
